title: Expressly Leslie Vegetarian Specialties
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Mediterranean, Take-out, Catering, Middle Eastern
description: A vegetarian Middle Eastern style food stall located in On the Square mall. Offers falafel in a pocket or as part of a salad plate, a variety of salads, 3 soups each day, a daily special, and smoothies. Seating is available in the adjacent Woodstock Square Mall atrium and during warm weather outdoors. Friday evenings live music.
